official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a project for flood control in the Felton Grove area, Santa Cruz County, California.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a flood control project in the Felton Grove area, Santa Cruz County, California. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a project for flood control in the Felton Grove area, Santa Cruz County, California.
